Text:
Anyone who is stupid enough to install "sexually oriented material" for their phone deserves whatever hackery that happens to them.  Whatever level or porn we are talking about is irrelevant.  It's just pictures and/or video.  Wanna pirate something?  Pirate a gallery app which hides pictures and videos so you can insert your own stuff onto your phone.

And if your argument is "but I don't know how to..." then you're simply too stupid to use one of these phones... get your money back or pay someone to do it the right way for you.
